item.title: Maartje add a quote by Daisy Bates
item.description: "No man or woman who tries to pursue an ideal in his or her own way is without enemies." -- Daisy Bates

item.title: Maartje add a quote by Roald Dahl
item.description: "Those who don't believe in magic will never find it." -- Roald Dahl

item.title: Maartje add a quote by Frederick Douglass
item.description: "Once you learn to read, you will be forever free." -- Frederick Douglass

item.title: Maartje add a quote by Mary Wollstonecraft
item.description: "The beginning is always today." -- Mary Wollstonecraft

item.title: Maartje add a quote by Frederick Douglass
item.description: "It is easier to build strong children than to repair broken men." -- Frederick Douglass

item.title: Maartje add a quote by Ayn Rand
item.description: "The question isn't who is going to let me; it's who is going to stop me." -- Ayn Rand

item.title: Maartje add a quote by Laurie Halse Anderson
item.description: "You have to know what you stand for, not just what you stand against." -- Laurie Halse Anderson

item.title: Maartje add a quote by Salman Rushdie
item.description: "Language is courage: the ability to conceive a thought, to speak it, and by doing so to make it true." -- Salman Rushdie

item.title: Maartje add a quote by Edgar Allan Poe
item.description: "Those who dream by day are cognizant of many things which escape those who dream only by night." -- Edgar Allan Poe

item.title: Maartje add a quote by Rita Mae Brown
item.description: "I think the reward for conformity is that everyone likes you except yourself." -- Rita Mae Brown

item.title: Maartje add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Maartje add a quote by Shel Silverstein
item.description: "Listen to the mustn'ts, child. Listen to the don'ts. Listen to the shouldn'ts, the impossibles, the won'ts. Listen to the never haves, then listen close to me... Anything can happen, child. Anything can be." -- Shel Silverstein

item.title: Maartje add a quote by Margaret Atwood
item.description: "Another belief of mine: that everyone else my age is an adult, whereas I am merely in disguise." -- Margaret Atwood

item.title: Maartje add a quote by John Burroughs
item.description: "The lure of the distant and the difficult is deceptive. The great opportunity is where you are." -- John Burroughs

item.title: Maartje add a quote by Jimi Hendrix
item.description: "I'm the one that's got to die when it's time for me to die, so let me live my life the way I want to." -- Jimi Hendrix

item.title: Maartje add a quote by Jonathan Swift
item.description: "May you live every day of your life." -- Jonathan Swift

item.title: Maartje add a quote by Willa Cather
item.description: "There are some things you learn best in calm, and some in storm." -- Willa Cather

item.title: Maartje add a quote by e.e. cummings
item.description: "Whenever you think or you believe or you know, you're a lot of other people: but the moment you feel, you're nobody-but-yourself." -- e.e. cummings

item.title: Maartje add a quote by Arthur C. Clarke
item.description: "The only way of discovering the limits of the possible is to venture a little way past them into the impossible." -- Arthur C. Clarke

item.title: Maartje add a quote by Francis Bacon
item.description: "A wise man will make more opportunities than he finds." -- Francis Bacon

item.title: Maartje add a quote by Søren Kierkegaard
item.description: "It is perfectly true, as philosophers say, that life must be understood backwards. But they forget the other proposition, that it must be lived forwards." -- Søren Kierkegaard

item.title: Maartje add a quote by Woodrow Wilson
item.description: "I not only use all the brains that I have, but all I can borrow." -- Woodrow Wilson

item.title: Maartje add a quote by Fran Lebowitz
item.description: "Think before you speak. Read before you think." -- Fran Lebowitz

item.title: Maartje add a quote by Edna St. Vincent Millay
item.description: "My heart is warm with the friends I make, And better friends I'll not be knowing, Yet there isn't a train I wouldn't take, No matter where it's going." -- Edna St. Vincent Millay

item.title: Maartje add a quote by Anthony Trollope
item.description: "A small daily task, if it be really daily, will beat the labours of a spasmodic Hercules." -- Anthony Trollope

item.title: Maartje add a quote by Arundhati Roy
item.description: "To love. To be loved. To never forget your own insignificance. To never get used to the unspeakable violence and the vulgar disparity of life around you. To seek joy in the saddest places. To pursue beauty to its lair. To never simplify what is complicated or complicate what is simple. To respect strength, never power. Above all, to watch. To try and understand. To never look away. And never, never to forget." -- Arundhati Roy

item.title: Maartje add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description: "All we have to decide is what to do with the time that is given us." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Maartje add a quote by Zora Neale Hurston
item.description: "Love is lak de sea. It’s uh movin’ thing, but still and all, it takes its shape from de shore it meets, and it’s different with every shore." -- Zora Neale Hurston

item.title: Maartje add a quote by Jasper Fforde
item.description: "If the real world were a book, it would never find a publisher. Overlong, detailed to the point of distraction-and ultimately, without a major resolution." -- Jasper Fforde

item.title: Maartje add a quote by Haruki Murakami
item.description: "Memories warm you up from the inside. But they also tear you apart." -- Haruki Murakami
